text: Vastavaniki allah visvasulaku mahopakaram cesadu; vari nundiye vari madhya oka pravakta (muham'mad) nu lepadu; atanu, ayana (allah) sandesalanu (ayat lanu) variki vinipistunnadu. Mariyu vari jivitalanu sanskarinci pavanam cestunnadu; mariyu variki granthanni mariyu vivekanni bodhistunnadu; mariyu vastavaniki varu intaku mundu spastanga margabhrastatvanlo padi vunnaru
